title: Global distribution systems : company revenues 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for 3 number of Companys.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Company Amadeus and lowest at Company Travelport.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars of Company Amadeus is 2.37% larger than the minimum value at Travelport.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for 3 number of Companys.
Company Amadeus has the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars and Travelport has the lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.

max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in each Company on the y axis.
Company Amadeus has the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars and Travelport has the lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 3.36 between the maximum Company Amadeus and minimum Company Travelport.
The lowest value 2.45 at Travelport is almost 1.47 times smaller than the average value 3.95.
